Welcome to EveryDayHabit.


Habits free up our mental capacity and energy by removing the need to make active decisions while performing habitual tasks. We can use the fact that our brains are constantly searching for behavioural patterns that can be automated to greatly improve our lives.


To achieve your life goals will require effort and perseverance, but to establish relevant micro habits to get you started does not. By breaking things down into the simplest possible daily activity that would take very little time and physical effort to complete, habit formation can be easy.


Focus on the basics of habit creation: Make the activity simple, keep the trigger and reward consistent, and do it every day.


Habits do not wait for Mondays or the first-of-the-months; all that matters is today. Your habit starts right now!
